alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Dutchess County through 615 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pawling, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pawling, Wingdale, Beekman, Stormville, Baker Corner, Woodinville, South Dover, Crouses Store, Hurd Corners, Green Haven, Sylvan Lake, Lagrangeville, Clove Valley, Poughquag, Pecksville, Pleasant Ridge, Webatuck, Clove, Quaker Hill and West Pawling. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
